title: wine_Riglos_2009_Gran_Corte_Las_Divas_Vineyard_Red_(Tupungato)
text:
Unnamed: 0: 109230.
country: Argentina.
description: This wine takes you on a trip to an outer wine world where deep, cushioned berry aromas come with exotic perfumes, bath oils and crushed flower petals. It's ultrasaturated and jammy, but not clunky or heavy. This tastes like a storm of blackberry, espresso and Swiss chocolate, while black spices and length bring up the rear. A blend of 50% Malbec, 40% Cabernet Sauvignon and 10% Cab Franc; drink nowâ€“2017..
